name: iConnect Cubic Universal
description:
THE 3TH GENERATION PRODUCT
Honors for iConnect Cubic:
1, Over 500,000 downloads;
2, Featured in the "Hot New Games" by Apple;
3, #1 Top App in China.


SUPPORT MORE DEVICES
It support iPod Touch, iPhone and iPad, RETINA display(iPod,iPhone and iPad) is supported too.


MORE INTERESTING
It’s re-designed and has much more fun.


CONTINUOUSLY UPDATED
New puzzles, new achievements, ...



iConnect Cubic is a puzzle game that training your ability for spatial thinking. Simple but fun.
Multi-touch is well supported, all is in your control.

The goal is very simple, remove all the icons in the limited time.
The rules for removing icons:
1, select 2 icons of the same pattern;
2, the selected icons can be connected within 3 straight lines, the line much be horizontal or vertical.
